quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
author: Whole Earth Catalog

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The simple life is its own reward.
author: George Santayana

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: May you live every day of your life.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Character is destiny.
author: Heraclitus

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Persistence guarantees that results are inevitable.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.
author: Wilson Kanadi

quote: Life becomes easier when you learn to accept an apology you never got.
author: Robert Brault

quote: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God.
author: Bill Keane

quote: Small steps in the right direction can turn out to be the biggest steps of your life.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Your imagination is your preview of life’s coming attractions.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: One day or day one. You decide.
author: Unknown

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The big secret in life is that there is no big secret.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
author: Robert Schuller

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Limit your 'always' and your 'nevers'.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
author: Sarah Louise Delany

quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: Dream as if you'll live forever, live as if you'll die today.
author: James Dean

quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: Life is trying things to see if they work.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
author: Socrates

quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
author: Cicero

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: I think, therefore I am.
author: René Descartes

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: Science is what you know. Philosophy is what you don't know.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: Man is condemned to be free.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: Life must be understood backward. But it must be lived forward.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: We live in the best of all possible worlds.
author: Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz

quote: The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it.
author: Epicurus

quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: If you want to be happy, be.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Out of the mountain of despair, a stone of hope.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Change is the law of life.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Peace begins with a smile.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself.
author: Jordan Belfort

quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: I would rather die on my feet than live on my knees.
author: Emiliano Zapata

quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
author: Les Brown

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Be curious, not judgmental.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The mind that is open to a new idea never returns to its original size.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Your life is your message to the world. Make sure it's inspiring.
author: Unknown

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Light tomorrow with today.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Stay positive, work hard, make it happen.
author: Unknown

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Leap and the net will appear.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Happiness is the highest good.
author: Aristotle

quote: Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Sometimes people don't want to hear the truth because they don't want their illusions destroyed.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: In every real man a child is hidden that wants to play.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The snake which cannot cast its skin has to die. As well the minds which are prevented from changing their opinions; they cease to be mind.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Is life not a thousand times too short for us to bore ourselves?
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: There are no facts, only interpretations.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: What does not kill me, makes me stronger.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I am not upset that you lied to me, I am upset that from now on I can't believe you.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The higher we soar the smaller we appear to those who cannot fly.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: No one can construct for you the bridge upon which precisely you must cross the stream of life, no one but you yourself alone.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Man is a rope stretched between the animal and the Superman--a rope over an abyss.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Thoughts are the shadows of our feelings—always darker, emptier and simpler.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Become who you are.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: One must still have chaos in oneself to be able to give birth to a dancing star.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: All truly great thoughts are conceived while walking.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The demand to be loved is the greatest of all arrogant presumptions.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: In mountains of truth, you never climb in vain.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: A thinker sees his own actions as experiments and questions--as attempts to find out something.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: He who would learn to fly one day must first learn to stand and walk and run and climb and dance; one cannot fly into flying.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Blessed are the forgetful; for they get the better even of their blunders.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: When we are tired, we are attacked by ideas we conquered long ago.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Every deep thinker is more afraid of being understood than of being misunderstood.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: A good writer possesses not only his own spirit but also the spirit of his friends.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Truths are illusions which we have forgotten are illusions.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The surest way to corrupt a youth is to instruct him to hold in higher esteem those who think alike than those who think differently.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Many are stubborn in pursuit of the path they have chosen, few in pursuit of the goal.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The real world is much smaller than the imaginary.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Everything the State says is a lie, and everything it has it has stolen.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: In end, we experience only ourselves.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: There are two different types of people in the world, those who want to know, and those who want to believe.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: You look up when you wish to be exalted. And I look down because I am exalted.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Greatness is a road leading towards the unknown.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Man is the cruelest animal.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: One should die proudly when it is no longer possible to live proudly.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Morality is the herd-instinct in the individual.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The irrationality of a thing is no argument against its existence, rather a condition of it.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Silence is worse; all truths that are kept silent become poisonous.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Whatever is done from love always occurs beyond good and evil.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: One often contradicts an opinion when what is actually uncongenial is the tone in which it was conveyed.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche
